text: The UEFA Nations League is an international football tournament. It is played between mens national teams from Europe. The tournament mostly replaces friendly matches between national teams in UEFA. ==Results== Season Host Final Third place play-off Winner Score Runner-up Stadium Third place Score Fourth place Stadium 2018–19 Details 1–0 Estádio do Dragão, Porto 0–0 Estádio D. Afonso Henriques, Guimarães 2020–21 Details 2–1 San Siro, Milan 2–1 Juventus Stadium, Turin 2022–23 Details 0-0 Stadion Feijenoord 3-2 De Grolsch Veste ===Performances by team=== Team Winners Runner-up Third place Fourth place 1 (2023) 1 (2021) 1 (2019) 1 (2021) 1 (2019) 1 (2023) 1 (2019) 2 (2021, 2023) 1 (2019) 1 (2021) ==Other websites== * Nations League Category:2018 in association football Category:2018 establishments in Europe
title: UEFA Nations League
